item.title: How to Become a DevOps Engineer: An Honest Guide
item.description: The role of a DevOps Engineer is one of the most sought-after positions in IT today, and it often comes with a lucrative salary. However, the path to landing this role can vary greatly depending on the company, with job titles like Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) or Platform Engineer sometimes being used interchangeably. Despite the differences in titles and interview processes, the core responsibilities of a DevOps Engineer remain consistent. Weâ€™re the ones bridging the gap between development and operations teams, driving automation and continuous delivery practices, and ensuring the reliability and scalability of applications and infrastructure.
